1.title: Someone's In the Kitchen With Mynah

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Ginger brings home a mynah bird, who can mimic anyone, and along with Jerry, brings mayhem to the whole house.

11.title: Eagle Eye Jerry/Catching Some Zs

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Eagle Eye Jerry: When Rick and Ginger go on a camping hike, Tom and Jerry become protective of baby eagles. Catching Some Zs: When Tom is put out of the house for the night, he goes to a graveyard where zombie cats come alive and Jerry Von Mousing must stop them.

14.title: It's All Relative

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Jerry's cousins come for a visit to the manor, but turn out to bring more trouble than they're worth.

21.title: Cuckoo O'Clock

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot:

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot:

28.title: Stolen Heart

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

28.plot: Tom and Jerry must investigate a missing cake that has a giant diamond ring inside, before a tough customer finds out it went missing.

42.title: Hyde and Shriek

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

42.plot:

1.title: Spike Gets Skooled/Cats Ruffled Furniture

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Tom gets Spike sent to obedience school, and Jerry is left without a protector. When Spike returns, Tom tries hard to get Spike to revert to his old ways. Jerry fights back to make sure that Spike keeps his cool./Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters, but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive, he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

2.title: Sleep Disorder/Tom's In-Tents Adventure

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Ginger gets a high tech mattress and Tom is forbidden to sleep on it./Tom and Jerry go camping in Yosemite; and Tom uses a magic spell wand to bring the furniture to life and needs help getting it back to normal.

3.title: Birthday Bashed/Feline Fatale

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Spike Forces Tom and Jerry to take over Tyke's Birthday party./Tom and Jerry protect Toodles from a Threat.

4.title: Cat Nippy/Ghost of a Chance

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Tom and Jerry end up fighting for the cover, yet end up getting locked out of the house due to fighting./Tom gets reminded he only has one live left. So he uses a magic spell in order to summon his duplicates.

5.title: Holed Up/One of a Kind

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Holed Up: When Jerry ventures out of his hole for a late night snack, Tom has a trap set for him. Unfortunately for Tom, he falls into his own trap and gets his head stuck through the wall. One of a Kind: Detectives Tom and Jerry are hired by Polly the Dog to get back her collar from mean Barkley at the park. Later, Barkley reforms when he meets Polly and falls in love with her.

6.title: Belly Achin'/Dog Daze

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Belly Achin': Little Quacker enlists Jerry's help to fix his favorite birdbath that has cracked, but the two get sidetracked by the scent of Tom's delicious Chinese takeout. Dog Daze: When Tom and Jerry fail to do things the right way, Spike must do everything he can to keep from losing his temper in front of Tyke.

7.title: Birds of a Feather/Vampire Mouse

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Birds of a Feather: Ginger is in charge of taking care of her mother's bird and Tom tries his hardest to keep from eating the bird. Vampire Mouse: Jerry pretends to be a vampire to scare Tom. Now it's up to Tom - with the help of his friend Newt - to defeat the vampire mouse!

8.title: Entering and Breaking/Franken Kitty

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Entering and Breaking: When Rick leaves Spike in charge of protecting the house against burglars, Spike steps up and trains Tom and Jerry to be his helpers.Franken Kitty: Tom is mistaken for Dr. Bigby's cat Wilson. Now Tom must convince Dr. Bigby he has the wrong cat! Meanwhile, Jerry and Napoleon are left with the real, very vicious Wilson.

9.title: Tom-Foolery/Haunted Mouse

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Tom-Foolery: Butch tricks Tom into switching places with him and sends Tom off to live the life of a street cat. But each finds the other's life to be quite difficult. Haunted Mouse: Tuffy hires detectives Tom and Jerry to investigate the ghost hauntings in his house.

10.title: Here's Looking A-Choo Kid/Superfied

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Here's Looking A-Choo Kid!: When it seems like Spike has developed an allergic reaction to Tom, Rick buys Ginger a hypoallergetic cat named Glory. Could Glory be too good to be true? Superfied: Dr. Bigby creates cookies that can give animals superpowers. Jerry and Napoleon sneak some cookies and have fun terrorizing Tom ... until the tables are turned.

11.title: What a Pain/Hop to It

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: What a Pain: After a particularly destructive chase, Tom and Spike have to go to the vet and Ginger hires an exterminator to take care of Jerry and Tuffy once and for all. Hop to It!: Tom and Jerry have to go retrieve an ingredient for the witches' spell before sundown, but when Tom sees Princess Toodles, he quickly forgets the mission.

12.title: For the Love of Ruggles/Sleuth or Consequences

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: For the Love of Ruggles: Tom impulsively kicks Spike's beloved chew toy over the fence and has to go get it back when he sees how heartbroken Spike becomes. Sleuth or Consequences: Butch and a squirrel detective steal all of Tom and Jerry's customers by using high-tech devices to solve crimes. Tom and Jerry challenge them to a case-solving competition.

13.title: Dinner Is Swerved/Bottled Up Emotions

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: When Ginger and Rick leave the house for a trip, Tom and Jerry plan to serve their girlfriends dinner, but things get competitive with them. Jerry gets affected by one of Dr. Bigby's experiments.

14.title: Turn About/The Plight Before Christmas

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Turn About: Butch locks Tom in the basement to keep him from a date with Toodles. Tom tries to escape, but keeps getting blocked by Jerry and Tuffy who think it's a monster downstairs. The Plight Before Christmas: Tom accidentally puts a spell on Santa and, as a result of Santa's new state, Tom and Jerry volunteer to help Santa deliver gifts. A Christmas miracle occurs.

15.title: Tuffy Love/Poof

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Tuffy Love: Jerry and Tuffy are getting ready to go to a family reunion, but unfortunately, Tuffy gets left behind. Tom thinks Tuffy is easy pickings, but he's in for a surprise. Poof: Tom and Jerry are hired by a bad magician to find out where his pigeon disappeared to during a magic trick gone awry.

16.title: Top Cat/Mummy Dearest

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Top Cat: When Tom and Butch compete to be top cat in the United Mouse Catchers, they must prove their worth by finally catching Jerry. Mummy Dearest: Hildie and Beatie commemorate the passing of their mother and Tom tries to help out by bringing her back from the grave.

17.title: Domestic Kingdom/Molecular Breakup

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Domestic Kingdom: Tom stars in a documentary that mischaracterizes his daily activities. All of his daily activities, from chasing Jerry to "romancing" Toodles are recorded. Molecular Breakup: Dr. Bigby invents a transporting machine that accidentally transports Jerry and Tom to Paris where they meet Gigi and Cozette.

18.title: Just Plane Nuts/Pets Not Welcome

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Ginger and Rick decide to bring Tom and Spike along on their Hawaiian vacation. After the plane incident, Rick and Ginger sneak Tom and Spike at "Paradise Resort" where pets are not allowed.

19.title: Cruisin' for a Bruisin/Road Trippin'

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: Rick and Ginger's vacation cruise ship, to make sure Tom and Spike don't cause havoc, they keep them in the carriers. Rick and Ginger go on a road trip to visit Ginger's great aunt Claire, but on the trip, Spike and Tom get lost.

20.title: Magic Mirror/Bone Dry

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: Magic Mirror: Hildie and Beatie bring home a fortune-telling magic mirror. When it shows Tom a future he doesn't like, he tries everything to avoid it - but this seems to make things worse. Bone Dry: Spike comes to Tom and Jerry for help finding his missing bones and the detectives investigate a community garden.

21.title: My Bot-y Guard/Little Quacker & Mr. Fuzzy Hide

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: My Bot-y Guard: Dr. Bigby upgrades Bot to a Bot-y Guard. When Tom sets off Bot's defensive systems, things get out of control and Jerry and Napoleon must disarm Bot without hurting him. Little Quacker and Mr. Fuzzy Hide: When the witches' herb garden is destroyed, Tom sets a trap to capture the pest responsible. Quackers helps him but is unknowingly the pest Tom seeks to capture.

22.title: Pipeline/No Brain, No Gain

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: Pipeline: When Tom and Jerry lose Ginger's wedding ring down the drain, they send Jerry through the pipes to retrieve it, but it leads down the drain, to the sewers and out to the beach! No Brain, No Gain: Dr. Bigby creates a helmet that turns Tom into a genius. Napoleon, Jerry and Hamster work together to take down the newly smart Tom who is now building a mouse-destroying weapon.

23.title: Cat Napped/Black Cat

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

23.plot: Cat Napped: Tom witnesses what seems like the kidnapping of Misty, the cute cat across the street. He enlists the help of her neighbor to track down her whereabouts. Black Cat: Fed up with Tom, Hildie and Beatie threaten to get a "real" witch's cat: a black cat. In desperation, Tom takes a magic potion that makes him turn black but only temporarily.

24.title: Hunger Strikes/Gravi-Tom

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: Hunger Strikes: Believing they are going to run out of food during a snowstorm, the pets start hoarding food. Things get out of control when they start stealing food and double-crossing one other. Gravi-Tom: Jerry and Napoleon play around with Bigby's brand-new anti-gravity machine ... until Tom breaks into the lab and a chase begins.

25.title: Ghost Party/Cat-Astrophe

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

25.plot: When Hildie and Beatie go away on a vacation, Tom and Jerry has problems when their ghost nephew, Grayson. An asteroid is heading towards earth and Tom and Jerry are determined to stop it.

26.title: Curse Case Scenario/Say Cheese

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: An unlucky dog named Dutch goes to Detectives Tom and Jerry, saying that a ruby stone is stolen from his grandpa. When he tries out a new cheese-in-a-can that Rick and Ginger buy, Tom has a crazy day when he experiences hallucinations.

1.title: Dental Case/Picture Imperfect/One-Way Cricket

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Not wanting to go to the dentist, Spike has Tom and Jerry remove his tooth with weird results. It's Picture Day, and Jerry tries to get Tuffy ready as Ginger gets Tom and Spike ready as well. Jerry befriends a cricket who is causing trouble for Tom.

2.title: Tough Luck Duck/Slinging in the Rain/Squeaky Clean

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Tom, Spike and Tyke are followed and chased by a rain cloud. When the cloud disappears, Jerry and Tuffy fool them by pretending it's still raining; Rick orders the "Suck-Up" machine from a commercial on T.V.; Tom and Jerry both mess around with it; Little Quacker thinks he's the cause of Tom, Jerry and Spike's misfortunes after he walks under a ladder.

3.title: The Paper Airplane Chase/Round Tripped/Smitten with the Kitten

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Tom is determined to hijack the fun Jerry and Tuffy are having with making paper airplanes. Tom's hijinks take a turn for the worse when he realizes he's made a paper airplane out of Ginger's great-great grandmother's treasured fruitcake recipe.

4.title: Cheesy Ball Run/Say Uncle/Here Comes the Bribe

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Toodles' folks are coming for a visit. Problem is they think she's married with kittens. Tom plays the role of husband and volunteers Jerry and Tuffy to play their kittens.

5.title: Slappyhappy Birthday/Reward If Lost

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Jerry has mocked-up a Reward if Found poster with Tom's picture and the address of the neighbor with the ferocious dog listed as Tom's home. After being brought back home, Tom tries to escape and avoid being brought back again.

6.title: Big Top Tom/Reward If Lost/Build a Beast

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: When Hildie and Beatie believe they had a few of their things stolen, they use a little magic to create Bog, the Cottage Beast. The new addition makes Tom and Jerry wish they had copped to using the stolen goods to beat up on each other.

7.title: To Kill a Mockingbird/From Nuts to Soup/No Fly Zone

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: The witch sisters are brewing their latest concoction. As they put the ingredients into the cauldron, they discover the walnuts has disappeared. Jerry's enjoying the nuts. They blame Tom and send him out to gather nuts for the potion.

8.title: X Marks the Thumpin'/Charity Case/Duck, Duck, Loose

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Butch and Meathead don't want to miss a marathon of their favorite show so they make a deal with Tom to trade TV time for a treasure map. Tom and Jerry don't know the map is a fake.

9.title: Dandy Do-Gooders/Shadow Boxin'/Baby Blues

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. Having been strapped with Tom its entire life, the talking shadow refuses to go back to the life he once had!

10.title: Life's a Beach/Meanie Genie/Flea Bitten

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: After the witches fly off into the night, Tom chases Jerry into a room full of enchanted bottles. When Jerry tries to hide in one, he inadvertently releases a mischievous thousand year-old Genie who grants Jerry three wishes.

11.title: I Quit/The Art of the Deal/Hiccup and Away

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: After a rough cat and mouse, Jerry quits. Tom is stunned as he watches his friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave.

12.title: Tom-Fu/You Can't Handle the Tooth/Pain for Sale

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: After an unsuccessful attempt on Tom's part to catch Jerry, a traveling cat salesman is happy to sell Tom just what he needs; a series of elaborate mousetraps, tricks, and schemes. Tom attempts to dish out a world of hurt to Jerry.

13.title: Downton Tabby/Growing Pains/Toodle Boom

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Tom and Jerry get into a garden growing contest that turns out badly for Tom.

14.title: Bringing Down the House/Return to Sender/Jerry Rigged

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Over Ginger's objections, Rick has installed a high-tech home automation system. Tom and Jerry try using the system against each other but eventually the house kicks their butts and they lose complete control of the system.

15.title: The Art of War/Pillow Case/Home Insecurity

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: A cat and mouse ends with Tom taking a shot to the kisser that knocks the cat out. With first aid, Tom awakens a kung-fu master. Now Jerry, Tuffy and Spike must reverse whatever happened to Tom to make him so lethal.

16.title: The Tail of Two Kitties/Vanishing Creaming/Unhappily Harried After

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm that'll soften and beautify her gnarly-looking feet. She has Tom rub it in. Unfortunately, the foot balm is a little too strong and makes her foot disappear.

17.title: Splinter of Discontent/Forget Me Not/In the Beginning

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

33.title: Bringing Down the House

episode of.title: The Tom and Jerry Show (TV Series 2014– )

33.plot: An overly ambitious young house sitter ruins Tom's plans to rule the roost while Rick and Ginger are away. Jerry relishes in Tom's predicament, that is until the house sitter spots the mouse and he becomes enemy number one!

imdb.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
plot: A cat and mouse brawl with each other.::Will Herren
